attributes.action: Force Drivers Who Took Their Tests Before 1990 to retake
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many older drivers think they are perfect drivers and moan about how 'easy' the test is, the test they have never taken. It is a very difficult test so I feel all drivers who passed the easy test pre-1990 should be made to retake to continue driving, then we'll see how 'safe' they are.
